thread.title: Mr Paul Bain
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mr Paul Bain

author: Mr Paul Bain
title: Mr Paul Bain
text: Did our full house with your products (7 Roman blinds and two perfect fit blinds) and was hugely impressed with them. Millimetre perfect and really easy to fit. The perfect fit blinds are so good they look like they're part of the patio doors they're fitted to!. Would, and have been, highly recommend Blinds2go.
